visul module¶

该模块:`visul`包含数据可视化的类和函数。

visul.CAM(img_white, model, feature_layer, weight_layer, idx_predic=None, display=False, img_show=None, label_show=None, class_to_index=None, top2=False)¶
visul.CAMs(imgs_white, model, feature_layer, weight_layer, idxs_predic=None)¶
visul.cropMask(cam, img_show, display=False)¶
visul.overall(imgs, number_to_show=20)¶
visul.show_cross_history(path, title='Learning curves')¶
visul.show_cross_historys(paths, title='Learning curves', subtitles=None)¶
visul.show_grid(imgs, title=None, suptitles=None)¶
visul.show_history(path, title='Learning curves')¶
